name: Obsessive Chameleon Disorder
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2016

Theme: "ritual"

Follow a day in the life of Charlie, a chameleon struggling with OCD. Help Charlie make it through his day by solving challenging and interesting puzzles with increasing difficulty all centered around the theme of order and symmetry.
